org.opengis.cite.validation

Class SchematronValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opengis.cite.validation.SchematronValidator

  • public class SchematronValidator
extends Object
    Verifies that the content of an XML resource satisfies the constraints defined in an ISO Schematron (ISO 19757-3) schema. The schema may incorporate abstract patterns and inclusions (sch:include and xi:include elements).
    See Also:
    ISO 19757-3:2006

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

    • Field Detail

      • ISO_SCHEMATRON_SVRL_NS

        public static final String ISO_SCHEMATRON_SVRL_NS
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • SchematronValidator

        public SchematronValidator(Source schema)
                    throws Exception
        Constructs a validator for the given Schematron schema with the default phase enabled. If no default phase is specified, then all patterns are active. The results will be represented as a standard SVRL (Schematron Validation Report Language) document.
        Parameters:
        schema - The Source that represents the schema.
        Throws:
        Exception - If any error occurs while attempting to read or preprocess the schema.

      • SchematronValidator

        public SchematronValidator(Source schema,
                           String phase)
                    throws Exception
        Constructs a validator for the given Schematron schema and phase (pattern set).
        Parameters:
        schema - The Source that represents the schema.
        phase - The active phase; if null, the default phase is enabled (all patterns are active if no default is specified).
        Throws:
        Exception - If any error occurs while attempting to read or preprocess the schema.

    • Method Detail

      • validateSchema

        public ValidationErrorHandler validateSchema(Source schema)
                                      throws IOException
        Validates a Schematron schema against the official RELAX NG grammar (ISO 19757-3, Annex A).
        Parameters:
        schema - A Source to obtain the schema from.
        Returns:
        The ErrorHandler that received reported errors, if any.
        Throws:
        IOException - If an error occurs while reading the schema.

      • getRuleViolationCount

        public int getRuleViolationCount()
        Get the number of violations (failed assertions and successful reports) for the validation episode.
        Returns:
        An int value equal to or greater than zero.

      • ruleViolationsDetected

        public boolean ruleViolationsDetected()
        Indicates the occurrence of any rule violations.
        Returns:
        true if any rule violations have been detected; false otherwise.

      • setParameters

        public void setParameters(Map<String,String> params)
        Sets parameters required to evaluate Schematron rules.
        Parameters:
        params - A Map<String,String> object containing parameter names and values.

      • validate

        public Result validate(Source xmlSource)
        Validates the specified XML source document.
        Parameters:
        xmlSource - The XML resource to validate. A DOMSource must wrap a Document or an Element node.
        Returns:
        A Result containing the validation results as a standard SVRL report.

      • validate

        public Result validate(Source xmlSource,
                       boolean svrlReport)
        Validates the specified XML source document. The result is represented either as an SVRL (Schematron Validation Report Language) report or as plain text.
        Parameters:
        xmlSource - The XML resource to validate. A DOMSource must wrap a Document or an Element node.
        svrlReport - Produce an SVRL (XML) report; if false, the results are in plain text.
        Returns:
        A Result (DOMResult or StreamResult) containing the validation results.

      • generateTextResult

        StreamResult generateTextResult(Source svrlSource)
        Transforms a standard SVRL report to a plain text representation that only includes rule violations (positive or negative assertion failures).
        Parameters:
        svrlSource - The source for reading the SVRL report.
        Returns:
        A StreamResult holding the plain text output (as a byte stream), or null if the transformation failed.

      • compileSchema

        final net.sf.saxon.s9api.XsltExecutable compileSchema(Source schema,
                                                      String phase)
                                               throws Exception
        Creates an immutable representation of a compiled stylesheet that will generate an SVRL representation of the validation results when run against an instance document.
        Parameters:
        schema - A Source to read a Schematron schema.
        phase - The name of the active phase; if not specified, the default phase will be used (all patterns are active if no default is specified).
        Returns:
        A compiled stylesheet ready for execution.
        Throws:
        Exception - If the schema cannot be compiled for any reason.

      • importElement

        Document importElement(Element elem)
        Creates a DOM Document with the given Element as the document element. A deep copy of the element is imported--the source element is not altered.
        Parameters:
        elem - An Element node.
        Returns:
        A Document node.
